scripts.bootstrap: yarn --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org || npm install --registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org || cnpm install
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.reinstall: rimraf node_modules && rimraf yarn.lock && rimraf package.lock.json && npm run bootstrap

scripts-info.analyz: 生产环境执行构建打包分析
scripts-info.deploy: 生产环境执行构建并压缩zip包
scripts-info.build:see: 生成 see 平台部署发布物
scripts-info.escheck: 检测是否含有 ES6+ 语法
